description:
Discover the Marvel universe like never before with the exclusive superhero album!!

Complete Collection: All your favorite heroes, from the Avengers to the Guardians of the Galaxy.
Exclusive Illustrations: Unique, detailed images that will blow your mind.
Compelling Stories: Trivia and backstories that will enrich your Marvel knowledge.
A must-have collector's item.
title: Why should you have it?

description:
The people of Wakanda speak a real language.

Wakandaâ€™s official language is a variant of Xhosa, which is primarily spoken in Zimbabwe and South Africa. Coincidentally, these locations are also close to where Wakanda is situated in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
